title: STARTS_WITH
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string starts with any of the specified compare_strings (case-sensitive); otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: â€¦ compare_strings
parameters.description: One or more strings to check for at the beginning of string

examples:
IF(STARTS_WITH(Email, "sales@"), "Sales Inquiry", "General Inquiry")
-- This formula checks whether the Email field starts with "sales@".
-- If true, it returns "Sales Inquiry"; otherwise, it returns "General Inquiry".

tips.text: An empty compare_string always returns TRUE since every string starts with an empty string.
Punctuation and symbols are treated like letters.
